p: DNA was extracted from 300 μL frozen EDTA-whole blood using the Qiagen Flexigene kit (Qiagen, Venlo, Netherlands). Where frozen EDTA-whole blood samples were not available DNA was extracted from 200 μL frozen sera using the High Pure Viral Nucleic Acid kit (Roche Life Sciences, Basel, Switzerland) DNA was extracted according to the manufacturer’s instructions and eluted in 100 μL elution buffer and stored at minus 20 °C.
